name: Headsplosion
description:
In this zombie shooter/tower defence game, you will be tasked with delivering a payload to an arena where you can choose to fight until extraction to get more score or extract and save the score you already have. Upgrade your payload with MG turrets shoot zombies and climb to the top of the leaderboard.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space or Right Control to jump

Left click to fire, Right click to aim down sights

R to reload

Shift to sprint

Pick up green cylinders to refuel hauler.

Get green cylinders by headshotting zombies. (Including dead ones)

Upgrade hauler by aiming at green panel on back and pressing Enter.

Upgrades add MG turrets.

Upgrades cost Gold. (Cost is displayed when aiming at green panel)

Killing zombies add to your Score.

Score is only saved to leaderboard if you hit Y at the end.

If you kill several zombies in a row your killstreak marker increments, the score from killing a zombie is multiplied by your killstreak number. (minimum of 1)

If you die, you can respawn at the hauler, but it costs 50 fuel.

You can choose to not respawn if you think the hauler can reach the end on it's own.(in this case you will automatically win)

If the hauler runs out of fuel it will stop moving and the turrets will stop shooting.

If you die and the hauler runs out of fuel you lose and your score is not uploaded.

This  Game was made in 72 hours for the  Extra Credits Game Jam #6.
